segments.text: Hello , there . Welcome , and what can we assist you with ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning . I have a Bill of Exchange against Bank Acceptance here . I'd like to discount it . Is that possible here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we can do that . We require the original Trading Contract and also the VAT Invoice and the Commodity Delivery Documents . They all need to be in duplicate .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I've got all that here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have a copy of the ID card of the person who took care of the legal aspects of this ? The Legal Rep , I mean ? We also need the Loan Certificate as well . Do you have that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A copy or the original ? I guess you need the original , right ? OK , I'll return shortly .
segments.speaker: S2
